external_games.name: Fisher-Price: Time To Play - Pet Shop

name: Fisher-Price: Time To Play - Pet Shop
summary: Time to Play Pet Shop gives kids the chance to feed and care for animals in an interactive setting. They can choose names, groom and bathe the animals, and play pet vet. There are nine activities in all. Along the way, they will learn about over 40 species of furry, feathered, and scaly animals while enjoying paw-stomping original songs.
